questions.question: What is Shiba Coin?
answers: A new type of physical coin

questions.question: What is the limited supply of Shiba Coin?
Why is Shiba Coin known as the `Dogecoin killer`?
answers: Because it is based on the Dogecoin blockchain
Because it was created to replace Dogecoin
Because of its strong resemblance to Dogecoin in terms of branding and design
Because it has a larger community than Dogecoin

questions.question: What is ShibaSwap?
answers: A decentralized exchange for trading Shiba Coin and other tokens
A social media platform for Shiba Coin users
A new type of Shiba Coin token
A physical store that accepts Shiba Coin payments
